8.7 The FILE-SYSTEM module

<file-system-error>

Error

Summary

Error type signaled when any other functions in the File-System module signal an error.

Superclasses

<error> and <simple-condition>

Init-keywords

Library

system

Module

file-system

Description

Signalled when one of the file system functions triggers an error, such as a permissions error when trying to delete or rename a file.

Operations

None.

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
